seoDescription: Generate timestamp indicators for Discord chat messages
howTo: Pick a date, copy the desired timestamp from the {{syntaxColName}} column, then paste it anywhere in a chat message. The result will be a dynamic timestamp that displays differently for everyone based on their own timezone.

customInputs.label: Custom inputs
customInputs.explanation: Replaces the default inputs with ones that match the current language instead of your browser's

separateInputs.label: Separate inputs
separateInputs.explanation: Display two different inputs for date and time instead of a combined one (which is not supported in some browsers)

usefulLinks.lead: You may also find these useful:

server.p: Discuss the website, test the syntax and suggest features

bot.p: Generate timestamps with the <1>/timestamp</1> slash command
bot.pWithoutCommand: Generate timestamps from within Discord using slash commands

textColor.p: A simple app that creates colored Discord messages using ANSI color codes

notAffiliated: This project is not affiliated with Discord.

jsDisabled.title: JavaScript is necessary
jsDisabled.body: Your browser either does not support JavaScript or it's currently disabled. Some browsers disable JavaScript by default for security reasons, but it's necessary for this application. Please enable it and refresh the page, or use a different browser.
